(Nagisz UWP terminal)
(cmd line: -i tapdugo.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.20
safebottom0.20
overcut0.300

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.02

fmax900
fmin700
fratio0.8

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.025
c2 = 0.050 #furatok
c3 = 0.075 #vonalak
c4 = 0.500 #gyors
c5 = 0.150 #keret

gw = 0.3
gh = 0.3
(tápcsati)
offset17.65,11.75,0

b inline 0,0 size26.7,9.25 jg0.5 z$z1 c$c3 g1,$gw,$gh r5.0 b1 nl1,0,1,1 ns
b inline 0,8.25 size26.7,10.25 jg0.5 z$z1 c$c3 g1,$gw,$gh r3.5 nl1,1,1,0 ns
h -6.525,9.49 d3 jg0.2 z$z1 c$c2 ns
h 33.225,9.49 d3 jg0.2 z$z1 c$c2 ns

b outline -16.65,-10.75 size60,40 z$z1 c$c5 g1,$gw,$gh ns
